website_summaries.verdict: When it comes to features, versatility, and convenience, it earns our top spot.
pros: Adjusts as baby grows, from newborn to toddler
Comes with parent-friendly accessories, including a newborn sling, rinsing squeeze bottle, and storage hook
cons: Comes at a higher price than others we tested, but you get a lot for the money

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY IT!!! DANGEROUS FOR BABIES
customer_reviews.text: I was happy for bought this bathtub, I thought that it was so nice, until my baby got injured in his both little toe of each foot. I'm totally disappointed with this bathtub and with fisher price and Amazon! Because there is more reviews about it! They must take off this product because it's really dangerous for the babies. My son really got bad injured with the green insert and he bleed to much.
customer_reviews.author: Nathalia

customer_reviews.title: Came dirty.
customer_reviews.text: It came covered with brown stains.... absolutely disgusting... I expect a lot better than this. Who wants to put their child in this? I don’t understand why this honest review would be hidden...
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: The newborn sling is great but once you transition to stage 2 is when ...
customer_reviews.text: The newborn sling is great but once you transition to stage 2 is when the nightmare begins. My child cut both her pinky toes not sure on what or how. There are sharpe holes and if your baby likes to kick around it can give it a burn on 2 or more toes! I hate this product! Fisher price should really consider recalling this product!
customer_reviews.author: lee

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Definitely do not recommend!! It’s not for long babies. My 3 month old is 24 inches long.his head hung over,it’s extremely difficult to lift his bottom to wash him without the tub tilting back. Also it does not drain well. Baby’s pee in tub occasionally and you pretty much have to lift wet baby and dump water out of tub,unless you want him sitting in it
customer_reviews.author: deven f.

customer_reviews.title: This is a keeper
customer_reviews.text: We never used the green insert that is giving people trouble; baby could sit up fine without it. The sling is sooooooo helpful with a newborn, and we still use the blue bottle for rinsing shampoo. Easy to clean and no nooks for mildew to live. Well worth the price for ease of use and quality construction. Definitely keeping this for future babies!
customer_reviews.author: C. Crow

customer_reviews.title: Can cause injury to baby.
customer_reviews.text: I do not reccomend this product. At first I thought it was a great tub when my son was in the newborn stage, but when we transitioned to using the insert, as it is intended to be used, it caused my son injury on his feet. Basically the baby stopper has a pattern on it that acts like a cheese grater for baby feet. It took off the skin of my baby's pinky toes and had him bleeding in the tub. I'm sure this tub is great if you don't use the baby stopper, but as it is a core feature of the tub I would not recommend getting this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T.

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had purchased it years ago
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my 3rd kid. Love this bath. Things I didnt notice in the description...fits over kitchen sink and stays in place, has a storage hook to hang while it dries, comes with sprinkle bottle for rinsing a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: bolimbold

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous-DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is a dangerous tub. My baby has open, bleeding wounds on his toes after using this product only two times. This should be taken off the market. Fisher Price is a terrible company, consistently putting babies in danger. DO NOT BUY THIS.
customer_reviews.author: 50 Watt Records (Consignment)

customer_reviews.title: We like it
customer_reviews.text: All in all, we like this bathtub. Our baby doesn’t like the sling so we don’t use it even though he was only 6 weeks when we first got it. We found that as mentioned by others, the sling is quite high preventing the baby from being immersed in the water. Might be why our baby didn’t like it as he would get cold. So we do without and it’s worked fine for us. We’ve only had it for 2 weeks so we haven’t even used the sitting position but will try to update this review if anything else comes up.
customer_reviews.author: I. marin

customer_reviews.title: Great for first time parent
customer_reviews.text: First time parent, was so nervous about babys first bath! The infant insert works great though at keeping her in place and safely supported above the water. The squirt bottle is good to keep her warm and rinse her. Its easy to dry, it has a hook so we can hang it on the shower rod and its dry the next day. The underside is smooth though so it can slide around in the tub which was scary and frustrating at first - now we put a towel underneath and it doesn’t slide around anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Super nuggets

customer_reviews.title: Great for newborns, difficult with bigger babies.
customer_reviews.text: The sling was great for my son until he reached the weight limit (10lbs.). The main problem with this tub is that the drain plug is located underneath the insert that is used for the next steps. It is hard to snap the green seat in and out, and it is impossible to drain and plug the tub while the green insert is installed (without tipping the whole tub, of course).
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Bought it twice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tub twice! Second time to replace the first one that was left behind. I was browsing around to buy a different one since I needed a new tub but after looking and looking I figured I made the perfect choice the first time so why change? My baby is 9 months old, 21 lbs , 27 in and has a blast in this tub. There is infant insert for early baths when the baby is very small. Comes with shower toys too. I will be gifting this as well.
customer_reviews.author: La Vida Loca

customer_reviews.title: This was such a great buy for us
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great buy for us! We were using a sling that someone gave to us at my shower but this has been such an improvement and since buying this my son has really started to like bath time. We can have his toys in there and he can play while we wash him. I am not able to use it in the sink with the way that my sink is made but that would make it even more convenient. The insert keeps him upright since he can't quite sit on his own all the time. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little tub
customer_reviews.text: So far this bathtub is great! My grandson is only 8 weeks old so we haven’t used it in all stages but, it’s great for newborn infants. I love the sling and it’s easily removable and able to be thrown in the wash. The only bad thing is he tends to slide down so I hold on to him at all times. It would have been nice if there was something to keep him from sliding but, over all it’s a great little tub. My daughter got the same one. We love it so far. My grandson didn’t like bathing in the hard plastic ones.
customer_reviews.author: TBRIGHTBILL

customer_reviews.title: easy to use, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So far my newborn fits this great, we were looking for something that would grow with her and I think this tub will be perfect. Its easy to rinse out and clean, and it can hang on your shower rid to dry. She seems comfortable in the fabric hammock, you do have to provide additional support because new babies are so floppy, but as she gets stronger this won't be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: Now that our lo is 9lbs we needed something bigger then the flower thing. I'm happy this tub will grown with her. One thing to note she does slide down in the sling a little so watch out. Also it came with several warning stickers on it and it was very annoying to get them off. It is too big for my sink so definitely measure it. The only thing I don't like is that the baby slides down in the sling.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: baby sits too far out of water.
customer_reviews.text: very poor design, highly over priced. Baby is basically suspended outside of the water freezing while you try to clean and spray him while he cries from being cold. Buy a sponge mat instead.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product, great idea wish it were higher quality.
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was very excited about this tub and recommended it to friends as well and not even 6 months of ownership and the sling has frayed and broken so it no longer holds an infant! I do want another tub or a new sling, I want a product that will last! Very disappointing from Fisher Price 😡
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Best baby tub!!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a tub with newborn sling used with my first child. This is SO much better then my last one. The sling is great. The seat area helps prop them up during the newborn phase. My daughter uses the seat now at 5 months. Even though she can’t sit up on her own, the seat is supportive enough to hold her up. My 2 year old toddler loves to use the seat or whole tub (when the seat is out). Accessories are fun, cleans easily, hangs to dry. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Melodie Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Splish Splash What a Bath
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great about this bath, works as designed with transitioning from one stage to the next. The newborn hammock is a bit off, to one end of the tub it sinks pretty far into the water and to the other end of the tub their head kinda rests on semi hard foam bit of the tub itself, which doesn't strike me as too comfortable, but baby didn't mind and is now in the sit up phase. Is a good tub.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Louscher

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile with newborn to toddler
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this tub! Got as a gift from my baby shower and absolutely love it! I love how it grows with your child and doesn’t slid around in the tub. My son is now 9 months and we took the green seat out when he was able to sit up around 6.
customer_reviews.author: Elissa arreguin

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it and I think we’ll be able to use it for a while
customer_reviews.text: I’m so happy we got this tub. My son is only 2 mos but he loves splashing in it and I think we’ll get use out of it for quite a while. It’s nice and big but still fits on my bathroom counter. I love the hook, I can hang it on the shower curtain rod to dry and on the towel rack or in the closet to get it out of the way. I do wish the drain wasn’t under the plastic seat, but it’s not a big deal to dump it out.
customer_reviews.author: Crista

customer_reviews.title: 5 months old and still using it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this tub every day for my baby since he was just a few weeks old and it has always done it's job well! I dont know when you are suppose to transition to a regular tub but my baby is 5 months old and we still use it 🤷 I saw a lot of posts about children's toes getting cut and I am honestly very perplexed how that happened..my baby kicks and splashes in the water like a wild animal and we have never had an issue. Anyways, love this tub!!
customer_reviews.author: austin w.

customer_reviews.title: Best idea for baby baths great value
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter had csection. This little tub was easier on her to bathe little T. She put it on the countertop in the kitchen and when she was done the little drain plug lets water out into the sink. With the newborn attachment it made everything so much more enjoyable for both mommy and baby. Great price easy to clean and store. Will be able to use for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: aquahoma

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: It's okay. I received this as a gift from our registry and I had high expectations after reading so many good reviews. However, the sling seemed to be too big and our baby just got swallowed up by it and when placing her in it, it just sunk to the bottom. It's also very large so takes up a good amount of space. After giving our baby a couple of baths in it and not liking it, I ordered the First Year's tub which works much better for us.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Stein

customer_reviews.title: Just bought
customer_reviews.text: I have just bought it and therefore cannot comment much. The items are exactly as described. My only complaint is that the green seat was hard to remove before I knew how to get it out. The description should be accompanied by a video showing how to remove it. You have to manually push outward on the tub and then another person can grab and pull the seat out. I don't think this is a one person job.
customer_reviews.author: Anshika

customer_reviews.title: It’s fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It works so much better than the tub we had with baby # 1. Love the newborn sling and all the other stages it provides. The accessories it comes with are actually super awesome and helpful. Especially the blue squirter thing. The only thing I hate are all the stupid warning stickers they slap all over the cute green seat. It’s like yeah I love staring at those every time I bathe my baby. And they are not easy to get off. Anyway it functions well so Whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney A Fetterman

customer_reviews.title: Great seat support
customer_reviews.text: I needed to get a new baby tub because the Skip Hop one that I thought was super cute just wasn’t working out for us. I have twins and the mesh part just started smelling horrible. We’d wash it and let it air dry and I couldn’t get rid of the mildew scent. This tub is perfect. We don’t need the infant insert anymore, but the green seat is perfect as one of my twins is still a bit wobbly at sitting. The extra cup that comes with it are great for rinsing away soap too. My babies giggle every time I make it “rain” on them.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Great baby bath tub!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby loves this! He's still only 3 months so I haven't been able to try the insert for him to sit up but we use the sling and he's never had an issue with bath times. The little water spouts that come with it are perfect for rinsing his hair and body! Would definitely recommend to anyone with a newborn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works grate!
customer_reviews.text: The material is ok, I’m always thinking it’s going to rip on me in the middle of bathing my baby. But then again my baby is a big baby so I’m soon going to take it off. But the big reason why I gave it 2 stars is because it was used, it was dirty when it came in and it had hair :/ nasty I know. Nothing that couldn’t be wash and disinfected of course. But that was just wrong!!
customer_reviews.author: Pink

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find the perfect bathtub for my almost one month old and there was a lot of talk about another bathtub that was scratching baby's toes. I decided to purchase this one because I really wanted to swing and the fact that it could straddle a sink was a plus. I don't have a huge double sink that isn't divided so to be able to prop this up was perfect for us. Also I really love the hanging hook that you can hang over the shower to let it dry. For anyone with little boys out there the swing is low enough to submerge my little boys bottom so you won't get peed on.
customer_reviews.author: C. Maughan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean up and the dry with the hook ...
customer_reviews.text: My newborn really enjoys being in this. The hammock holds him well but after a couple washes the hammock does stretch out and looses a little of it's tautness. Easy to clean up and the dry with the hook attachment. Is a bit bulky in my small bathroom but worth it so I don't have to wash my baby in the sink :)
customer_reviews.author: Joolee

customer_reviews.title: All I need!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bath tub for my baby. Used it all the way to through the stages....He is currently 14 months and uses the tub without any support. I have a shower only in my bathroom so this is a perfect replacement. I just use my shower hand held nozzel to fill the tub and rinse his body for a quick bath before bed time routine. Love this so much, I bought this for my cousin's baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Ngo

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: It has a hook that you can hang it to dry which I like and for obvious reason isn't collapsible. So it is a bit bulky. Has a lot of options for giving a baby a bath for different stages so absolutely love this and it was very handy. Yes, would buy this again and yes is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: swtchks

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret buying this!
customer_reviews.text: After going through 2 other types of bathtubs for our LO we found this and absolutely love it! By far the best one we’ve found and it’s perfect for newborns and as they get older. Our LO is now 8 months and just sitting in his own, this seat is perfect to help keep him from tipping over or backwards and allows us to still use the lay down portion when needed!
customer_reviews.author: wilsonsc1

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware!! Recieved used product!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this baby bath tup after reading all of the wonderful reviews. However, after opening the box it appeared I had received a used product. The warning stickers looked as if somebody had tried to peel them off, and there were what appeared to be watermarks and scratch marks all over the bottom inside of the tub and the seat. The bottom of the legs also have scuff marks on them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Annoying bath tub
customer_reviews.text: Its an okay product, but not comfy for newborns, and my newborn is always sliding down in it. Its a constant battle.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves his tub! He feels safe, he can sit up in the tub and younger baby’s can lay back in the hammock for a safe and fun bath time. It’s important that bath time isn’t a dreaded time for our baby’s and this tub makes it fun for him to splash in without worrying about drowning or getting water and soap in the ears or eyes..great tub!
customer_reviews.author: ButterflySong

customer_reviews.title: Great for wiggly babies
customer_reviews.text: My son (4 months) loves to kick and splash everywhere and with our old tub he would kick enough and start sliding into the tub (yikes!) after getting the fisher price sling n seat tub I don’t have to worry about him sliding into the tub when kicking and splashing! He seems to have so much more fun being more stable - and I love that he can grow with this tub and have a new appropriate place to sit for bath. It also comes with a little bottle that can spray water like a shower head - it’s his new favorite bath toy! He gets so excited when I bring that out! Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea B

customer_reviews.title: Great baby tub!
customer_reviews.text: I had my fourth kiddo three months ago and have never liked any of the previous tubs I’ve bought for the baby stage. They always seem to slip sideways or slide down. But this tub is the winner!! Of course I haven’t used it for anything over 3months old yet, but as far as babies go- this tub works! And the accessories that come with it are useful too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This works nicely. Only con is that the plug is underneath ...
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for something after our baby out grew her blooming flower bath cushion that fits in the sink. This works nicely. Only con is that the plug is underneath the green support seat so you can’t drain it with the baby in it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my new granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: After my daughter had another tub for her new baby that was awful ... I bought this for baby. My daughter loves it, Baby is supported nicely from newborn stage on the sling. Will transition once she gets older to tub. Great safe product, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Diane K.

customer_reviews.title: So far works well
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have only used this for my 7 week old daughter so I can’t comment on the sitting up chair insert but the tub itself is great. The only thing I could complain about is where my infant lays her head in the tub, it’s very hard there’s no cushion for the back of her head as she’s laying down in the sling. Besides that, the tub does it’s purpose and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: The Noll Girls

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we needed
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly what I needed! My daughter didn't like taking baths and this made it so much easier for her and us. This keeps her in her spot so she won't move around to much, and my daughter is a wiggle worm. I only wish that the seat was easier to take off to drain the water. I always feel like I'm going to break it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie G

customer_reviews.title: Newborn bath
customer_reviews.text: I really like this tub. I have a newborn and I like the sling. If you put a newborn in there, make sure you are holding there body up with one hand. I put my baby in the sling thinking it would support him, but he sank in and almost drank water. The tub was a fourth full of water. The accessory to spray water doesn't work too well. Not a problem for me because I had my own. I like that this tub will adjust to his size.
customer_reviews.author: Saul muniz

customer_reviews.title: Not great for newborns
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for my newborn so far. It's easy to set up and clean. However, the baby slides down on the sling during her baths, the angle is too steep for a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Ziggy's Family

customer_reviews.title: Not the best for my baby!
customer_reviews.text: I don't think my newborn/infant is very comfortable in the sling. He tends to slide down a lot and may weigh too much for the sling. Wouldn't buy again for newborn. He was 8 ibs 12 ounces at birth and is now about 12 ibs at 7 weeks. Maybe it will work better for him once he can use the other functions of the tub without the sling.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Ferrell

customer_reviews.title: Great design. Removal parts are perfect to accommodate our baby as he grows
customer_reviews.text: I love this tub. The sling is perfect for bathing our infant. As he grows, the sling can be removed and there is a larger tub. That tub can be removed as well and you have a tub that is large enough for a year old baby. Very great design.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality and versatile options.
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used this yet but I'm impressed with the quality of the materials and how everything is modular to grow with baby. It's pretty big, luckily we have a cabinet that fits it or else I'd be annoyed having such a big tub with no where to store it. Will fit in our tub nicely or on the kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Christin Juliet

customer_reviews.title: Not very much support when using sling !!!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for a good while with my son the only thing I will say is when he was a bit smaller he kept sliding down in the sling which I didn't like so I would say when using the sling it does lack some support but other than that its a pretty good starter tub!!!
customer_reviews.author: Desirae

customer_reviews.title: Mold
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying a Summer Infant tub because the sling kept getting moldy and i feel that one piece construction is more sanitary and easier to maintain. I like the one we have now much better and it's less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: S. Anne

customer_reviews.title: Could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Easy to hang and dry. Works good for bath time. Con: The net creates lot of bubbles which is hard to clean off baby. The drain hole is slow at letting water out and doesn’t remove water from a section of the seating.
customer_reviews.author: Bharath

customer_reviews.title: Great for all sizes!
customer_reviews.text: I had a preemie at 33 weeks when I could finally bring her home she was just 4 pounds, the sling is perfect for new babies to give them a nice soothing bath, now at 8 pounds I still use the sling. It is so easy to use and clean and I use the hook to hang on the towel rack above the bed. Perfect spot to store it, so my own bathtub isn’t taken over.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa K.

customer_reviews.title: Loved this baby bathtub
customer_reviews.text: I registered for this product when I had my daughter, and we used it for over a year. The mesh and chair options make it a very good product, as it easily transitions between ages. I loved it so much that I bought one for my niece when she was pregnant. It is a little pricey but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca M.

customer_reviews.title: Work great for newborn bath time
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my 2 month old. It is pretty sturdy and easy to clean by remove the plug at the bottom. It fits in the kitchen sink for when the baby was smaller. The little blue bottle is perfect to use on a small baby’s face. The only complai is that it is not easy to store since it is kind if a sizeable item.
customer_reviews.author: PMB

customer_reviews.title: Love that it can be used through so many stages
customer_reviews.text: Love that it can be used through so many stages. Baby just grew out of the sling stage. The drain location is a little frustrating. When you need to empty while baby is still in tub to rinse or whatever you have to lift tub slightly to get water to flow out. Not sure how you can remedy that though.
customer_reviews.author: KJR

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this baby tub! I previously had a different one that sat at an awkward angle and didn't have any type of adjustment. What's great about this is it goes from the newborn sling all the way up to a mini bathtub. I currently use the green support seat with my 7 1/2 month daughter! Also plan on using this for all stages when we decide to have another baby!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Grows with your child
customer_reviews.text: My son has been using this tub for a year. We have a stand up shower and no tub! He has transitioned well from newborn, infant to toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Housseini Family

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Good for Infants
customer_reviews.text: I find the fabric of the infant insert really holds up, bath after bath. And my infant has doubled in size since he started getting full baths. The tub is easy to clean. I read some reviews for this bathtub that described the fabric as not holding up and the bathtub as hard to clean. I just have not seen that. I have experienced the opposite. I'm glad I purchased this infant tub.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Good tub for our infant
customer_reviews.text: Good tub for our infant. A few thoughts. I wish the net was a tad higher or that the drain hole was a bit bigger so the water doesn't collect as high onto the baby's back. I also wish that the feed had rubber or something because the tub slips in the larger tub when putting him in and taking him out.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M

customer_reviews.title: looks just like the picture
customer_reviews.text: it is cheap and works amazing it breaks down and grows with her which if you have a kid you know how fast they grow and how much money it cost to keep up with the growing! this grows with her saving money. my kid loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Manny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I ordered came in the original box so it was easy to get from the mail haven't used it yet but cute sturdy bath just like I have for my daughter and came with a little fishy cup to gently pour the water on them and a little bottle to mimic a shower head perfect for washing their hair
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: NB mesh sling easy to use
customer_reviews.text: So far I have used this for my son only as a newborn, utilizing the sling mesh seat. It is easy to use and he seems comfortable. It is a bit bulky but fits on my bathroom counter top. Easy to dump into the bath tub or empty using the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tub. My son loves it and I love ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tub. My son loves it and I love that it can grow with your baby so it is not just for one use and then you have to buy something else. The hook is nice and I use that as it fits over the "hand rail" in the tub once I dump the water out each night so it can dry.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R.

customer_reviews.title: love that it grows with the baby and comes with ...
customer_reviews.text: Works well for us, love that it grows with the baby and comes with little bath accessories. The built in hook is a nice feature so that it can drip dry. This bath makes it easier to keep baby's head safely out of the water throughout bath time.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper22

customer_reviews.title: The BEST Bathtub Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Before getting this system out baby hated the bath! We had tried many other types of tubs and seats passed down to us. We ended up getting this after a recommendation from a friend and baby instantly loved bath time! Each step has been excellent as it has grown with her!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tub
customer_reviews.text: This tub is rad!! It was our 3rd tub purchase and my daughter is 21 months now and Still in it (we live in CA there's a water shortage so it's better then using the full tub) my only complaints would be the green foam on the back rest gets a little red over time because of being wet so often and it's not able to be cleaned because it comes apart when scrubbed. And the little plug on the bottom is too tempting for little hands. Sometimes she can't resist unplugging before we are done. but over all I'm beyond satisfied with it!
customer_reviews.author: JulieB

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Sooo convenient and easy to use. I love that it accomodates baby at different stages. I got carpul tunnel during pregnancy and it has not gone away. As such I find the sling very useful and baby is comfortable as he also gets to feel the water. The bottle helps to keep him engaged while rinsing.
customer_reviews.author: Harpie

customer_reviews.title: Packing was poor causing scratches to tub
customer_reviews.text: Bathtub is wonderful; bought same for my niece. Unfortunately, the packaging done very poorly; tub scratched inside it. As it was just for me, scrubbed it to remove dark-type scratches. Items for babies should really be is pristine condition. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: LOVE. THIS
customer_reviews.text: I. LOVE. THIS. I have been using the same tub that I used with my first baby. I always have to put my arm under them bc they are always slipping down into the water. This is such a brilliant concept! Thank you! Wish I would’ve found it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Best bath tub !! Love it !! No regrets at all ^_^
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! I got it for my first baby. No regrets!! I love that comes with many parts to help you out with holding the baby. Nice! You can clean it easily and my baby is happy and comfortable which is the most important. I recommend it for new parents out there ;)
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Right

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: I like this tub.. use it for my NB & I m so glad there is sling otherwise it will be hard to bathe my NB in it.. since it’s 4-in-1.. it’s quite big & cant use in my stand in shower so I use in my home’s only bathroom with tub.. otherwise no complaints.. reasonably priced & does the job well:))
customer_reviews.author: Shivani Tia

customer_reviews.title: Bath time for infant
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bath tub to give our newborn a bath. As first time parents we have found this item easy to use. I like the hook it has so we hang it in the bathroom’s shower curtain rod to dry and it’s also out of the way when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: A User

customer_reviews.title: Don’t like the sling
customer_reviews.text: The water has to be quite full to reach the sling, but baby slides and ends up with his face in the water (now he’s bigger so just eats in the water). Wish it had something to keep him upright a little more
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good beginner and intermediate tub
customer_reviews.text: Started with a plastic tub with hammock. Our little one outgrew that but was still too small to sit up in only the plastic tub. This has an interim plastic seat you can put in for that in between time. Love it, works great.
customer_reviews.author: Jen from MI

customer_reviews.title: love this bathtub
customer_reviews.text: Honestly i was skeptical to buy this tub.. but its turned out great. Its size is perfect, the green/support seat perfectly supports my 3 month old so as not to slip. The hook option is great for easy storage! and the toys are awesome to gently rinse washing his hair.
customer_reviews.author: koko

customer_reviews.title: Good tub
customer_reviews.text: Great little tub, can't sait to convert it as my son grows. However in the sling right now, he slides down in it have to keep holding him in place so his ears dont get filled with water, kinda hard washing him one handed.
customer_reviews.author: Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Cute little baby bather!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift about a year ago, and the my cousin sings this tubs praise quite often! They say it is easy to use, baby doesn't slip or slide, and enjoys bath time in comfort!
customer_reviews.author: bookbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Nice Baby Bath
customer_reviews.text: So far we’ve only used it with the sling, but it’s working great. My baby seems comfortable in it. I love how it has a hook so that you can just hang it up in the shower to dry. And the sling is machine washable so that’s nice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella

customer_reviews.title: Dope
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my baby shower, it’s perfect. Fits right in the sink, and sometimes I just put it on the floor. The sling thing makes it easier to clean my baby without holding him.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and useful, baby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: There are plenty of baby tubs available on Amazon. I went with this one after comparing it with couple of others. It has got pretty good reviews from other fellow Amazon shoppers, its priced right and from Fisher-Price. So, you can't go wrong with this one. Currently, we are using it with "Sit-me-up support" which I found pretty useful as my baby love to sit and take bath while playing with her bath toys.
customer_reviews.author: cybnitc

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed. Uncomfortable for baby.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tub thinking it would grow with my baby, but I have been very disappointed. The sling wasn’t bad, but the seat just makes everything awkward. He sits too far out of the water and seems uncomfortable with or without the seat. I love most FP products too. If you tend to have larger babies, I would recommend something else. I had the $14 First Years tub with my first baby and I liked it better. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jffrank44

customer_reviews.title: Made bath time SO MUCH EASIER
customer_reviews.text: First time mom: I didn't think it was necessary at first, but my daughter LOATHED bath time before we got this tub. The sling has kept her comfortable and content. She's finally starting to be able to sit up on her own so time to test the next stage in this tub. Overall; she's happy, I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Really liking this tub so far in its newborn mode. The fact that it is self-contained is a huge win! The baby can get a bath anywhere without needing to be in a sink, etc. And cleaning it is also simple. Would recommend for any baby shower registry!
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: When the hammock is soaked with water it gets really cold which makes the baby cry and violent. So if you get 3-4 people to help bathe the baby and be done in 3 minutes then you’re okay
customer_reviews.author: B.C.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty well
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't fit in the sink very well like it's designed to do. It's as if it was made just a LITTLE too short. I have to go back to my son's bathtub that is a little too small for him so I'm not hunched over the bathtub while he's still in the laying position. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mercanto

customer_reviews.title: Longer use life!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely better than the infant-only tub we were planning on getting, we'll get more use out of this. The packaging was fine, nothing was broken or dented. It all fits together really nicely and is a great size, I'm so glad we settled on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin C.

customer_reviews.title: Funtional but could use some work.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the color scheme on this product was cuter. Its very functional, however the toddler seat is a pain in the butt to get off! My husband and I spent probably ten minutes trying to pull it off when we got it! Also the blue squirt bottle needs more holes in the middle. Over all its a good product, the company could have just made it a little more mom friendly and more aesthetically pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: We started to use it when my baby was born and now she is 7 month. We used all of the three stages. My baby loves them all! So easy and convenient to use!
customer_reviews.author: Fye

customer_reviews.title: A great, versatile tub that fits over our bathroom sink ...
customer_reviews.text: A great, versatile tub that fits over our bathroom sink opening perfectly and safely. Used nearly daily from newborn to now (approximately six months), this had made bathing easy and (usually) non-fussy.
customer_reviews.author: balthisar

customer_reviews.title: Love that it grows with your child!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bathtub. I had two different ones that I ended up hating and finally found this one. I love that it grows with your child and I even bought my friend one! Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: madelyn

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a lifesaver. The sling was a great help during the 0 to 3 month stage. I stopped using it when he was about 4 months as he simply outgrew it. At 7 months I'm still using the insert. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for long baby
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect tub for my long baby. He was too long to fit in our other infant tub and not sitting up yet so the seat section was perfect. He sits up now and we still use it for him. Little toys were extra bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Welch

customer_reviews.title: Best and Beautiful Bath Tub
customer_reviews.text: The product is the best thing i ever purchased for my new born! He is enjoying it and also extremely safe to handle. Thanks to Fisher Price for making wonderful products.!
customer_reviews.author: Amz Lover

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: I had in the past one that i loved, but I couldn't find it anymore, and this is the closest. I like that I can sit my babu when he gets older. And also that it has a hanger for you to hang it on the shower.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: So nice for a newborn!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect little sling for a new born. Very secure and it doesn't seem like they could roll out accidentally. Very easy to set up and use. Cute little toys that come with 👌
customer_reviews.author: Bluefield2145

customer_reviews.title: Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Threw a baby shampoo/soap/lotion set, hooded towels, and bath toys inside, of this bath, slapped on a bow and Voila! the cutest little baby shower gift!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne E. Stark

customer_reviews.title: Lopsided with an under mount sink
customer_reviews.text: If you do not have a top mount sink or a sink where the middle divider is as high as your countertop then it’s not going to fit in the sink. Otherwise it’s a tub and it’s fine.
customer_reviews.author: Merredith

customer_reviews.title: Baby tub for the first year
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with scratches and scuffs. Will have to wash out real well before thinking of putting the little one in there. Missing Shutterfly coupon
customer_reviews.author: Wishy

customer_reviews.title: Watch for Sling Straps Coming Loose
customer_reviews.text: Wished I had seen the SHNUGGLE Bath before purchasing this. It is okay, but if you have an infant, they are out of the water when in the sling and get cold. Also, the sling strap came apart the very first time I attempted to use. (Item replaced). Cut accessories. A bit larger than I had hoped, but I'll deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: Film Noir Lover

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price 4-in-1 Sling 'n Seat Tub
product_meta.description: Style:StandardThe 4-in-1 Sling 'n Seat Tub from Fisher-Price adjusts to fit your baby from newborn, to infant, to toddler, to keep your growing little stinker safe and comfortable as they get squeaky clean. With removable features like a soft newborn sling, an infant support insert, and fun bath time toys, this convertible tub adapts to your baby's changing needs at every stage!
feature_bullets: Convertible bath tub for use from newborn to toddler (max. weight 25 lb/11,3 kg)
Includes soft mesh sling for newborns and infant insert to prevent slipping and help support unsteady sitters
Plug for easy draining and cleaning
Convenient hook for drying and space-saving storage
Comes with squeeze bottle and whale scoop for gentle rinsing or play
Four stage convertible bath center with squeeze bottle & whale scoop for gentle rinsing or play
Stage 1: Soft mesh sling for newborns
Stage 2: “Baby stopper” insert prevents slipping & sliding
Stage 3: Sit Me Up Support aids unsteady sitters
Stage 4: Roomy toddler tub Plug for easy drain & clean

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars2,149 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
